extendedInfo.description: Now you can use your android device as a weight scale. There are a million and one uses for a digital weight scale app. Measure in both ounces and grams with this hand scale. This app has been developed with a innovative interface design to facilitate user interaction. Set up determined WEIGHTS with this app.Before you can use the scale you must select calibrate, then place an object of known weight on the scale and enter it in either grams or ounces. Then you must select convert to in order to acquire the weight. The most realistic looking and acting hand scale on the market! I bet your friends didnât know it even existed.*Move to SD card*Supports both grams and ounces* Compatible with Tablets and HoneycombThis weight application can be used to convert grams to ouces or ounces to grams. Weighting is simulated through the touch screen. Though this app may serve a function it is mainly designed for fun.

reviews.comment: Very disappointed! Doesn\'t work at all. Wish I could get a refund. Should say its a gag app like all the others :-(

reviews.title: Do not buy this!  This app has no value.  It does nothing useful.
